channel.title: What is a vps/how to use it/ and where to get it?
channel.description: Hi i got a server but i hate keeping my laptop on all night how and where do i get a vps ? any websites you'd reccomend and also why do they ask you for domains to? all i need is for them to run my server for me? someone please explain in full detail?
